Uses of Class
moulton.scalable.draggables.ScrollBar

Packages that use ScrollBar
Package Description
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.

  • Uses of ScrollBar in moulton.scalable.texts

    Fields in moulton.scalable.texts declared as ScrollBar
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected ScrollBar TextHistory.bar
    The scroll bar to change which strings are displayed.
    protected ScrollBar TextBox.textScroller
    The scroll bar to change TextBox.startShift and view text in unseen virtual space if allowed (TextBox.hasVirtualSpace).
    Methods in moulton.scalable.texts that return ScrollBar
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ScrollBar TextBox.getHeightScrollBar()  
    ScrollBar TextHistory.getHeightScrollBar()  
    ScrollBar TextBox.getTextScroller()
    Returns the scroll bar used to view text hidden in virtual space (if allowed by TextBox.hasVirtualSpace).
    ScrollBar TextBox.getWidthScrollBar()  
    ScrollBar TextHistory.getWidthScrollBar()  
    Methods in moulton.scalable.texts with parameters of type ScrollBar
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void TextHistory.setScrollBar​(ScrollBar bar)
    Sets the scroll bar so the text history can show more than just recent messages.
    void TextBox.setTextScroller​(ScrollBar textScroller)
    Sets the scroll bar that will be used to view text hidden in virtual space if such is allowed by TextBox.hasVirtualSpace.
